items.sentence: I\'ll never forget having a good time with you all.
Tom thought that Mary wasn\'t getting enough sleep.
Did you hear about the time Tom tried to kill Mary?
Do you hear someone moving around in the next room?
Tom doesn\'t have to answer any of these questions.
Tom said that Mary wasn\'t good at speaking French.
I can\'t believe he renounced his U.S. citizenship.
How much of what you just told me did you tell Tom?
How much pocket money do you get from your parents?
How much stuff have you accumulated over the years?
How much time have you spent discussing this topic?
We wandered aimlessly around the shopping district.
Tom won\'t be able to buy everything that he needs.
You\'re not fooling anyone, Tom. We know it\'s you.
We can\'t change history, but we can learn from it.
I can\'t believe you did all this without any help.
Did you hear about what happened here this morning?
Do you think you can climb to the top of this tree?
Tom suspected Mary and John were dating each other.
Tom probably has an extra pencil he could lend you.
Tom probably knows someone who can teach us French.
Tom probably ran into these kinds of problems, too.
I know that you\'ve been keeping something from me.
If I have any more questions, where can I find you?
Tom used to play lacrosse, but he doesn\'t anymore.
Tom was groping around in the dark for his glasses.
Tom was hungry, so he asked Mary to cook something.
Tom was sentenced to three years in federal prison.
Tom isn\'t the only one here that can speak French.
Tom thinks there\'s a good chance he\'ll find Mary.
I don\'t think Tom knows where Mary studied French.
I don\'t think Tom will ever be able to walk again.
I don\'t think anyone really thought Tom was happy.
I take it we\'re stuck here for the next few hours.
They should tell Tom Mary doesn\'t have to do that.
This picture was taken shortly before Tom\'s death.
I addressed the envelope containing the invitation.
Tom has been told not to try to do that by himself.
Tom has been watching Mary like a hawk all morning.
Tom has known Mary since they were both very young.
They told me that I was overqualified for this job.
This is a list of the people who came to the party.
This is the camera that Tom took the pictures with.
Tom keeps encouraging Mary to do things on her own.
Tom doesn\'t have time right now to talk to anyone.
I\'d feel better if you weren\'t going there alone.
Tom and Mary told me that they want to get married.
Tom and Mary told me they thought John was nervous.
Tom and Mary tried to convince John not to do that.
Tom and Mary usually speak to each other in French.
